all_questions.question: Who took part in two screens?
all_questions.context: So, A took part in two screens

all_questions.context: E is the only system which gets one out of one

all_questions.question: Why is the evaluation considered unreliable?
all_questions.context: Obviously this is too small evaluation, so this is an unreliable number

all_questions.question: Which system was better than any other system in one case?

all_questions.context: So, better than any other system judged
